Class GiftController

  • java.lang.Object
    • is201.g5t08.farmcity.control.GiftController

  • public class GiftController
extends java.lang.Object
    A GiftController does all the validations, controls the GiftDataManager, execute sending gift function

      • isSameReceiver

        public boolean isSameReceiver(java.util.List<User> receiverList)
        This method returns boolean value It loops through the gift records of the logged user If the receiver of existing gift records exists in receiverList, it returns true It returns false if the receiverList does not contain same user
        Parameters:
        receiverList - the gift receiver list
        Returns:
        false if gift receiver is not founded in receiverList

      • isValidUser

        public boolean isValidUser(java.util.List<User> receiverList)
        This method returns boolean value It loops through the receiver list It returns true, if the user from receiverList is null or the user is logged user or the user is not friend of logged user
        Parameters:
        receiverList - the list of gift receiver
        Returns:
        false if user is a valid user

        Returns:
